campaign.description: All 20 original assignments remade using Augustus features. More difficult than the original but not a hardcore experience.

scenario.name: Ostia 706BC
scenario.description: Establish Rome's first colony at the shores of the Tyrhennian sea.

scenario.name: Brundisium 245BC
scenario.description: Develop a profitable city in Magna Graecia.

scenario.name: Capua 350BC
scenario.description: Establish an important city in central Italy.

scenario.name: Tarentum 272BC
scenario.description: Manage Roman Legions at Tarentum to resist local Greeks.

scenario.name: Tarraco 270BC
scenario.description: Establish a crucial supply hub in Hispania.

scenario.name: Syracusae 212BC
scenario.description: Repel Carthaginean attempts to control the largest city in Sicily.

scenario.name: Miletus 133BC
scenario.description: Build a prosperous city amidst harsh conditions of Asia Minor.

scenario.name: Mediolanum 222BC
scenario.description: Defend Italy from its greatest foe, Hannibal Barca and his massive army.

scenario.name: Lugdunum 43BC
scenario.description: Establish a cultured and profitable city in Roman Gaul.

scenario.name: Carthago 48BC
scenario.description: Choose your side in the civil war, and rebuild Carthago to its former glory.

scenario.name: Tarsus 67BC
scenario.description: Manage many imports and exports in the mining region of Tarsus.

scenario.name: Tingis 70BC
scenario.description: Establish a city at the edge of the known world.

scenario.name: Valencia 138BC
scenario.description: Manage large quotas of raw exports and combat corruption in Hispania's largest city.

scenario.name: Lutetia 11BC
scenario.description: Build a large city and overcome many difficulties that await you in Gaul.

scenario.name: Caesarea 10BC
scenario.description: Establish a city without any local food production.

scenario.name: Damascus 64BC
scenario.description: Secure vital water supply and develop Damascus into a large profitable city.

scenario.name: Londinium 47AD
scenario.description: Establish an economy scale and despite many difficulties, develop a huge city in Roman Brittain.

scenario.name: Sarmizegetusa 102AD
scenario.description: Build a city of Roman standards on the Dacian frontier of the Empire.

scenario.name: Lindum 122AD
scenario.description: Assist Emperor Hadrian in building his massive wall while you manage Lindum.

scenario.name: Massilia 218BC
scenario.description: Assimilate local Greeks and defeat Carthaginean forces for one last time in Massilia.
